name: ironman.vim
description:
Color scheme with bright background to work hours and hours in front of the monitor.
How it looks? http://www.emm97.de/vim/ironman.png

For GUI only.
install_details: Drop it in $vim/vimfiles/colors and add "colorscheme ironman.vim" to your vimrc

versions.release_notes: some small modifications (inspired by colorsheme PYTE thanks Henning)
